title: Binders
abstract: An un-reacted substantially formaldehyde free curable binder solution for binding loose matter consists essentially of a solution obtainable by dissolving a reducing sugar, an ammonium salt acid precursor optionally a carboxylic acid or a precursor thereof and optionally ammonia in water.
function: What is the essential function of the product or process?

The essential function of this patent is to provide a substantially formaldehyde-free binder solution for binding loose matter, such as mineral fibres, into a desired shape. The binder solution consists of reducing sugars, ammonium salts, and optionally carboxylic acids or their precursors, dissolved in water. The solution has specific pH and solids content requirements and may include silane or silicon-containing coupling agents.
